name: Escape (itch) (PoisonousWhisp)
description:
It is mainly a puzzle solving pc game for windows. By solving 

the puzzle the player can escape the place. Escaping the place is 

the main task in the game. This is for my first game jam. So, please 

forgive me if I made a lot of mistakes. However, it was a fun experience. 

Please let me know what you think about this.

Controls:

"W" , "A" , "S" , "D"  - movement

mouse - looking

"space bar" - jump

"E" - interact

"H" - Hint

instructions:

You have to cross an invisible bridge pointing by a wood. After that push the button near the door. - first level

You have to cover all keyframes with key with sign with respect to the hints. After that push the button near to the door - second level

You have to place 4 books in 2 bookshelves. books must be placed in the middle and last section of bookshelves which are facing each other with respect to the hints. After that push the button near to the door. - third level

solve the maze - fourth level

Hint meaning:

First level hint is about which color button needs to be pressed how many times and in which direction.

Second level hint is about how you should use the sign table shown in a picture frame to fill up the empty frames with sign. 

Third level hint is about which books of quote you should choose.
